Service Details: - Recycles all types of scrap metal from households scrap, automobiles, industrial, construction, and demolition scrap metal- Packages and prepares scrap metal to sell as a product world-wide- Also recycles commercial lighting fixtures and non-PDB ballasts at this location- For more recycling options, please visit the Multi-Material BC, Return-It, or ReGeneration websites
Hours: Mon-Fri: 8am - 4pmSat-Sun: ClosedNote: Please call to make arrangements for delivery outside of regular hours.
